First, create an in-memory RSQLite database:  
```{r}
library(RSQLite)
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(SQLite(), ":memory:")
```
List its tables (0 at the moment):  
```{r}
dbListTables(con)
```
Insert a new table -- use the mtcars dataset:  
```{r}
dbWriteTable(con, "mtcars", mtcars)
```
Now, list the tables:  
```{r}
dbListTables(con)
```
List the fields in the table:  
```{r}
dbListFields(con, "mtcars")
```
View the data:  
```{r}
dbReadTable(con, "mtcars")
```
Select and display all 4 cylinder cars:  
```{r}
res <- dbSendQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM mtcars WHERE cyl = 4")
dbFetch(res)
```
Clear the results:  
```{r}
dbClearResult(res)
```
Disconnect from the database:  
```{r}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
